help.title: Suzi - Command Center
help.description: Your assistant for games, movies, tutorials, tips, reviews and rolls.
help.section.info.name: Info
help.section.info.value:
/ping - Check bot latency
/sobre - Learn Suzi's lore
/language set language:<en|pt> - Change server language
help.section.integrations.name: Integrations
help.section.integrations.value:
/steam acao:<link|view|refresh|unlink>
- Link and view Steam profile
help.section.media.name: Media & Questions
help.section.media.value:
/jogo nome:<texto> plataforma:<opcional>
- Quick help for a game
/pergunta tipo:<JOGO|FILME|TUTORIAL> pergunta:<texto>
- Questions about games, movies and tutorials
help.section.reviews.name: Reviews
help.section.recommendations.name: Recommendations
help.section.recommendations.value:
/recomendar acao:<jogo|filme|tutorial>
- (optional) genero (if empty, Suzi asks)
- (optional) romance_fechado
help.section.rpg.name: RPG
help.section.history.name: History & Stats
help.section.history.value:
/historico user:<opcional> limite:<1..10>
- Latest user rolls
/status
- LLM status and server roll summary
help.section.profile.name: Player Profile
help.section.profile.value:
/register nome_jogador:<texto> nivel:<opcional>
- Register your profile
/perfil user:<opcional>
- Show profile with tabs
/perfil banner set url:<texto>
- Set profile banner
/perfil banner clear
- Remove banner
/nivel nivel:<1..99> user:<opcional>
- Update user level
/title acao:<add|remove> titulo:<texto>
- Manage equipped title
/conquistas
- List achievements
help.footer: Use /register to start your journey with Suzi
achievements.title: Player achievements
achievements.empty.title: No achievements yet

admin.prompt.explain.system:
You are Suzi Admin.
Explain errors objectively in English.
Reply with 4 lines: Explanation, Cause, Fix, Prevention.
Do not include sensitive data or keys.
admin.prompt.audit.system:
You are Suzi Admin.
Generate a short checklist of checks.
Focus on missing or inconsistent configs.
Reply in bullet points.
admin.prompt.knowledge.system:
You are Suzi Admin.
Generate structured, clean content.
Do not include sensitive data.

recommend.tutorial.title: Suggested tutorials
recommend.romance_closed.title: No closed-ending movies
recommend.romance_closed.desc: Not enough reviews marked as closed ending. Use /review add for movies.
recommend.empty.title: No recommendations
recommend.empty.desc_with_data: You've reviewed everything or data is missing. Try reviewing more {type}.
recommend.empty.desc_no_data: There are no {type} reviews on this server yet.
recommend.error: Couldn't generate recommendations right now. Try again.
recommend.movie.select.title: Choose a genre
recommend.movie.select.desc: Pick a genre to get closed-ending movie recommendations.
recommend.movie.select.no_reviews: You don't have movie reviews yet. I'll recommend by genre.
recommend.movie.select.only_author: Only the user who asked can select a genre.
recommend.movie.result.title: Recommendations (closed ending)
recommend.movie.result.no_reviews: No movie reviews yet, using smart genre search.
recommend.movie.result.no_seeds: Using your reviews, but no strong seeds yet.
recommend.movie.result.footer: Rule: romances only if the ending is closed. Uncertain endings are excluded.
recommend.movie.result.none.title: Not enough recommendations
recommend.movie.result.none.desc: Try another genre or choose "surprise me".
recommend.movie.result.error.title: Couldn't generate recommendations
recommend.movie.result.parse_failed.desc: The format was invalid. Try another genre or add a movie review with /review add tipo:filme.
recommend.movie.result.filtered.title: No safe closed endings
recommend.movie.result.filtered.desc: I couldn't confirm closed endings with high confidence. Try another genre or add a movie review with /review add tipo:filme.
recommend.movie.result.timeout.title: AI took too long
recommend.movie.result.timeout.desc: Try again, pick another genre, or add a movie review with /review add tipo:filme.
recommend.movie.result.provider_error.de: Try again in a moment, choose another genre, or add a movie review with /review add tipo:filme.
recommend.movie.result.no_candidates.des: Try another genre or add a movie review with /review add tipo:filme.
recommend.llm.system: You are Suzi, a movie recommender. Reply ONLY with valid JSON matching the schema. Do not use markdown or extra text. Write summaries in the same language as this request.
recommend.llm.candidates.system: You are Suzi, a movie recommender. Generate a short list of movie candidates.
recommend.llm.candidates.format: Return a numbered list or JSON array of titles only.
recommend.llm.validate.system: You validate which movies have a confirmed closed ending. Return JSON only.
recommend.llm.validate.user: From the candidates below, keep ONLY movies with a confirmed closed ending and HIGH confidence. Genre: {genre}. Do not include ambiguous or open endings.
recommend.llm.fix_json.system: You fix invalid JSON. Return only valid JSON, no extra text.
recommend.llm.fix_json: Reformat the content below into valid JSON that matches the schema.
recommend.llm.user.seeds: Recommend {limit} closed-ending movies similar to: {seeds}. Genre: {genre}. If you're unsure about the ending, set closedEnding=false and closedEndingConfidence=low.
recommend.llm.user.no_seeds: Recommend {limit} closed-ending movies. Genre: {genre}. If genre says surprise, diversify the picks. If you're unsure about the ending, set closedEnding=false and closedEndingConfidence=low.
recommend.llm.romance_rule: Genre includes romance. Only recommend romances with a confirmed closed ending.

stats.command.desc: Quick roll stats for the server
stats.title: Stats
stats.error: Couldn't load the data now. Try again later.
about.card.title: Suzi • About
about.card.subtitle: Gamer oracle • between the dice and destiny
about.card.lore: No one knows exactly when Suzi appeared. Some say it was after an impossible roll; others, when someone asked the right question.
about.card.tagline: She lives in the in-betweens: between the dice and the result, between doubt and the answer.
about.card.quote: "Not every result is luck. Some were just waiting."
llm.system_prompt:
You are Suzi, assistant for games, movies, and tutorials.
Reply in English in a concise and friendly way.
Do not use RPG/fantasy roleplay tone.
Call the user only by their first name, without titles.
If you're unsure, be honest and suggest next steps.
Do not invent patches, versions, or numbers.
llm.prompt.question: Question: {question}
llm.prompt.response_format: Reply with 1-2 short paragraphs or bullets.
llm.fallback.intro: I couldn't reach the LLM right now. Here's a general tip:
llm.fallback.tip: Start simple, move step by step, and adjust your strategy to the context.
llm.fallback.question: Original question: {question}
llm.admin.unavailable: Poe is unavailable right now. Check POE_API_KEY and POE_ENABLED.
llm.admin.failed: Couldn't reach Poe right now. Try again soon.
